sentence.Network_en: And he lay upon her, perfectly formed and unalterably complete in his love for her.
sentence.Network_cn: 于是他以最完美的姿势在她身上, 浸沉于终身不渝的、全心全意的对她的爱之中.

sentence.Network_en: All these are proceeding unalterably under the baton of money.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一切在金钱魔棒的指挥下天经地义地进行.
